code: import{applyMiddleware,createStore,compose}from"redux";import rootReducer from"./root-reducer";import thunk from"redux-thunk";var composeEnchancer=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var middlewares=[thunk];var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnchancer(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares)));export default store;
